title: Susie's special shepherd's pie
ingredients: ['potatoes for mashing', '1 handful grated cheese (if necessary)', 'oil as needed', '250g minced meat of your choice', '1 (400g) tin beans', '1 handful peas', '1 handful sweetcorn', '3 carrots, finely chopped', '500ml gravy, flavour of your choice', 'butter and milk for mashing potato']
